articles.title: Trump announces 30% tariffs against EU, Mexico to begin August 1
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced 30% tariffs on the European Union and Mexico, effective August 1, as part of his trade policy to revive the U.S. economy.

articles.title: Guatemalan villagers lynch 5 men accused of robbing homes after earthquakes
articles.description: In Santa Maria de Jesus, Guatemala, residents lynched five men accused of looting homes following a series of earthquakes, highlighting the community's response to the disaster.

articles.title: Pennsylvania Lawmakers Propose Media Literacy Curriculum Amid Growing Fake News Concerns
articles.description: Pennsylvania lawmakers introduced bills to mandate media literacy education in schools to combat misinformation and promote critical thinking among students.
